pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)$(br2)Used as the base item for most Ex-Aid items$(br2)Used on the $(l:misc/blocks/machine_blocks#gamecreator)Game Creator$(/l) to obtain Rider Gashats$(br2)Used on the $(l:misc/blocks/machine_blocks#ganbarizing_machine)Ganbarizing Machine$(/l) to obtain Legend Rider Gashats

Drops from:$(li)$(l:ex_aid/mobs/genm_mob)Kamen Rider Genm$(/l)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/mobs/graphite_bugster_mob)Graphite Bugster$(/l)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/mobs/rideplayer)Ride-Players$(/l)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/mobs/poppy_red_mob)Kamen Rider Poppy$(/l)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/mobs/para-dx)Kamen Rider Para-DX$(/l)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/mobs/cronus)Kamen Rider Cronus$(/l)
